member.name: LVTILEINFO
member.summary: Provides information about an item in a list-view control when it is displayed in tile view.

member.name: LVTILEINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the LVTILEINFO structure.

member.name: LVTILEINFO.iItem
member.summary: The item for which the information is retrieved or set.

member.name: LVTILEINFO.cColumns
member.summary: The number of data columns displayed for this item. When retrieving information, initialize this value to the size of the puColumns array. On return, the member is set to the number of columns actually set for the item.

member.name: LVTILEINFO.puColumns
member.summary: A pointer to an array of column indices, specifying which columns are displayed for this item, and the order of those columns. When retrieving information, allocate an array large enough to hold the greatest number of columns expected.

member.name: LVTILEINFO.piColFmt
member.summary: A pointer to an array of column formats (for example, LVCFMT_LEFT), one for each of the columns specified in puColumns. When retrieving information, allocate an array large enough to hold the greatest number of column formats expected.
